results.title: Economic development
results.creator_credit: Ian Dunlop, Maslyn Williams and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: For the people of Papua and New Guinea the time when the family patch of land was the basis of society and the foundation of existence is passing. Commercial agriculture has been introduced and opportunities of wage earning are raising living standards. Main products are copra, coconut oil, coffee, and cocoa. Agricultural research stations have been established by the Administration for the benefit of both white settlers and native growers. Government Co-operative buying has been introduced and the new economic opportunities have enabled the people to become partners with the Administration. The cocoa industry is showing particularly rapid development.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ian Dunlop, Maslyn Williams and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit

results.title: Eclipses of the sun and moon
results.creator_credit: William Kay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Illustrates solar and lunar eclipses, and explains the effect of the position of the earth’s and moon’s orbital planes on the frequency of eclipses. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
